about_the_game:
Harvest Days: My Dream Farm - Digital Supporter Pack

The Harvest Days: My dream Farm digital supporter pack includes digital goodies and enhances your farming fun with exclusive content such as the comprehensive guide book, an additional in-game outfit for your character, premium seeds and much more.

Outfit for your ingame character
The coolest style is yours! With the exclusive in-game outfit for your character, you'll cut a fine figure not only when plowing!

Premium Seeds
Receive exclusive premium seeds for free at the beginning of the game, which you would not be able to purchase until much later without the Digital Supporter Pack! Plant, nurture and sell - the high prices you'll get with the Premium Seeds will fill up your wallet!

Guide Book
The official digital Guide Book helps you to take the first steps to become a farmer, supports you with valuable hints and becomes your faithful companion on the exciting path to your dream farm.

Harvest Days Calendar 2023
Think about the future now! Get your printable Harvest Days calendar (A4 and A3) for the year 2023 and roam through the colorful seasons Harvest Days has in store for you!

4K Wallpapers
Exclusive wallpapers will bring the joyful atmosphere of Harvest Days to your desktop.

Exclusive Soundtrack
Experience life in the countryside throughout the seasons with excerpts from the Harvest Days soundtrack.

Access to the digital goodies
All digital goodies can be found in the Steam installation directory of the game in the folder "Digital Supporter Pack Content"(Steam\SteamApps\common\Harvest Days) after the download of the "Digital Supporter Pack" DLC package is completed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
